elementSpec.desc: contains the transcription of a topographic line in the source document

zone.line: All sorts of fancies running through

remarks.p: This element should be used only to mark up writing which is topographically organized as a series of lines, horizontal or vertical. It should not be used to mark lines of verse (for which use l) nor to mark linebreaks within text which has been encoded using structural elements such as p (for which use lb).
